metadata.name: Transmutation Tablet
metadata.description:
• Active (6 room charge) • Converts passive items/familiars of a low quality into an item of a higher quality • Repentance and multiplayer support
Loosely based on the Minecraft Tekkit/Equivalent Exchange item of the same name, the Transmutation Tablet allows you to convert lower-quality items into a single higher-quality item. The catch is that you can't pick exactly which items you convert or which new item you get, so don't use it recklessly!
The default costs are: • 2x 0-quality items -> a 1-quality item • 2x 1-quality items -> a 2-quality item • 2x 2-quality items -> a 3-quality item • 4x 3-quality items -> a 4-quality item ... but these costs can be adjusted between 1 and 6 each using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]Mod Config Menu[/url].
Repentogon is recommended but not required; if you don't have it, the item names printed upon conversion will be less human-readable.
[u]Synergies:[/u] • Car Battery: Two conversions will be performed, if possible. • Quest items (Polaroid, Key Pieces, etc.): These are ignored; they will not be created or destroyed.
